title: Wild Card Weekend preview
itunes:title: Wild Card Weekend preview
description:
A room filled with heroes – Colleen Wolfe, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling, and Marc Sessler – discuss the latest news from around the NFL, including the Bucs firing head coach Lovie Smith after two years, and Sean Payton announcing he will remain the Saints head coach. Then, the heroes go game-by-game breaking down each Wildcard matchup as the postseason officially kicks off with Wildcard Weekend. Plus, the heroes bring back a podcast favorite – “What’s More Likely?” – to help preview all the playoff action. Oh, and Gregg even makes a few picks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
